happy.translation: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor].
So remember me; I will remember you.
And He found you lost and guided [you].
And remember the favor of Allah upon you.
My success is only by Allah.

sad.translation: And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress.

sad.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًۭا وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ ۚ
sad.translation: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make a way out for them, and provide for them from sources they could never imagine. And whoever puts their trust in Allah, then He ˹alone˺ is sufficient for them.

sad.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
sad.translation: And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.
So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth.

sad.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَىْءٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْخَوْفِ وَٱلْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
sad.translation: We will test you in fear, hunger, loss of wealth, life and fruit, but give glad tidings to the patient.

sad.arabic: فَصَبْرٌۭ جَمِيلٌۭ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
sad.translation: So patience is most fitting. And Allah is the one sought for help against that which you describe.

sad.arabic: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُ فِى ضَيْقٍۢ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
sad.translation: And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress.

sad.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
sad.translation: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow the reward of those who do good to be lost.

sad.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱصْبِرُوا۟ وَصَابِرُوا۟ وَرَابِطُوا۟
sad.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed.

angry.translation: And remember your Lord when you forget.

angry.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
angry.translation: And whoever puts all his trust in Allah ﷻ, He will be enough for him.
My success is only by Allah.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.
Say, 'Indeed, the guidance of Allah is the [only] guidance.'

angry.arabic: رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
angry.translation: Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it].

hope.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًۭا وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ ۚ
hope.translation: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make a way out for them, and provide for them from sources they could never imagine. And whoever puts their trust in Allah, then He ˹alone˺ is sufficient for them.
Verily, with every difficulty, there is relief.

hope.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
hope.translation: And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.

gratitude.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor].
So remember me; I will remember you.
And He found you lost and guided [you].
And remember the favor of Allah upon you.

patience.translation: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth.

patience.arabic: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَىْءٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْخَوْفِ وَٱلْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْوَٰلِ وَٱلْأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
patience.translation: We will test you in fear, hunger, loss of wealth, life and fruit, but give glad tidings to the patient.

patience.arabic: فَصَبْرٌۭ جَمِيلٌۭ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
patience.translation: So patience is most fitting. And Allah is the one sought for help against that which you describe.

patience.arabic: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُ فِى ضَيْقٍۢ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
patience.translation: And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress.

patience.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
patience.translation: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow the reward of those who do good to be lost.

patience.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱصْبِرُوا۟ وَصَابِرُوا۟ وَرَابِطُوا۟
patience.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed.

trust.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُۥٓ
trust.translation: And whoever puts all his trust in Allah ﷻ, He will be enough for him.
My success is only by Allah.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.
Say, 'Indeed, the guidance of Allah is the [only] guidance.'

trust.arabic: رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعْطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلْقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
trust.translation: Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it].

guidance.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

guidance.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَهْدِى لِلَّتِى هِىَ أَقْوَمُ
guidance.translation: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable.

guidance.arabic: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُمُ ٱلْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ ٱلْعُسْرَ
guidance.translation: Allah intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship.

guidance.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
guidance.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah and be with those who are true.

blessings.translation: And He has made me blessed wherever I am.
Indeed, my Lord is merciful and loving.

blessings.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًۭا
blessings.translation: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make a way out for them.
And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.
And We made your sleep [a means for] rest.

unity.arabic: وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِحَبْلِ ٱللَّهِ جَمِيعًۭا وَلَا تَفَرَّقُوا۟
unity.translation: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided.

unity.arabic: وَتَعَاوَنُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلْبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَلَا تَعَاوَنُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ
unity.translation: And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression.

reality.translation: You prefer the life of this world, while the hereafter is better & more lasting.
And all will come to Him on the day of Resurrection alone.

reality.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ ۖ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ
reality.translation: The life of this world is only the enjoyment of deception.
So let not this present life deceive you.

reality.arabic: وَمَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا إِلَّا لَهْوٌۭ وَلَعِبٌۭ
reality.translation: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement.

reality.arabic: قُلْ مَتَـٰعُ ٱلدُّنْيَا قَلِيلٌۭ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لِّمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ
reality.translation: Say, 'The enjoyment of this world is little, and the Hereafter is better for he who fears Allah.'

divine.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
divine.translation: But they plan, and Allah plans. And Allah is the best of planners.
And Allah is predominant over His affair.

divine.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًۭا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
divine.translation: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.

good.translation: Do what is beautiful. Allah loves those who do what is beautiful.

good.arabic: وَلَا تَسْتَوِى ٱلْحَسَنَةُ وَلَا ٱلسَّيِّئَةُ ۚ ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ
good.translation: The good deed and the bad deed are not the same. Return evil with good.
So race to [all that is] good.

good.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ فَسَنُیَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡیُسۡرَىٰ
good.translation: But as for he who gave [in charity] and feared Allah and believed in the best [reward], We will ease him toward ease.

good.arabic: وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ يُوَفَّ إِلَيْكُمْ
good.translation: And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah.
